name: Knighter
description:
RUN until you will lose all your health!

Knighter is a simple 2D top-down pixel art Infinite Runner - your goal is to get as high score as you can and do not die!

Unlock amazing skins for Coins and run as:

★ Knighter

★ Shniter

★ Pigeon

★ Hoodier

★ Goblino

★ Eyeball Bat

★ Golden Knighter!
